publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5756 Shona Robison: The National Health Service (Charges for Drugs and Appliances) (Scotland) Regulations 2007—That the Health Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the National Health Service (Charges for Drugs and Appliances) (Scotland) Regulations 2007 (SSI 2007/139).

S2M-5756 Shona Robison: The National Health Service (Charges for Drugs and Appliances) (Scotland) Regulations 2007—That the Health Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the National Health Service (Charges for Drugs and Appliances) (Scotland) Regulations 2007 (SSI 2007/139).
